name: interterritorial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between different territories (= countries or parts of a country): African leaders organized a congress to establish an interterritorial movement for African political rights and liberties. Increasing militancy caused great consternation at the inter-territorial level. Related word
territorial
More examplesFewer examplesFor a long time there was no effective link between the interterritorial coordinating committee and the individual territorial branches.Inter-territorial competition has become an important feature of capitalism, undermining the autonomy of nation states.A new inter-territorial fund could help make pension-fund investments less risky.The new railway system incorporated many of the interterritorial railways in the south of the country.
